test.name: CT003 - Deve permitir que o usuário convide amigos ao clicar no botão roxo de indicar amigos

kw.name: Open Application
kw.doc: Opens a new application to given Appium server. Capabilities of appium server, Android and iOS, Please check https://github.com/appium/appium/blob/master/docs/en/writing-running-appium/server-args.md | *Option* | *Man.* | *Description* | | remote_url | Yes | Appium server url | | alias | no | alias | | strict_ssl | No | allows you to send commands to an invalid certificate host like a self-signed one. |

kw.name: Dado que o cliente está na página inicial
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` is visible.

kw.name: E ele arrasta a tela para baixo
Swipe By Percent
kw.doc: Swipe from one percent of the screen to another percent, for an optional duration. Normal swipe fails to scale for different screen resolutions, this can be avoided using percent.

kw.name: Swipe By Percent
kw.doc: Swipe from one percent of the screen to another percent, for an optional duration. Normal swipe fails to scale for different screen resolutions, this can be avoided using percent.

kw.name: Quando ele clica no botão roxo no campo de indique seus amigos
Espera o elemento e clica nele
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` is visible.

kw.name: Então ele pode visualizar as informações do campo de convite de amigos
Espera o elemento e verifica conteúdo
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.msg: xpath criteria: //android.widget.ImageView[contains(@content-desc,"Resgate seus amigos da fila do banco")]
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` is visible.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.msg: xpath criteria: //android.widget.ImageView[contains(@content-desc,"Resgate seus amigos da fila do banco")]
kw.doc: Verifies that element identified with locator is visible.

kw.arg: 'Resgate seus amigos da fila do banco Para cada indicação aceita, um amigo salvo da burocracia'

kw.name: Espera o elemento e espera que esteja desabilitado
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` is visible.

kw.name: Element Should Be Disabled
kw.doc: Verifies that element identified with locator is disabled.

kw.name: Run Keyword If Test Failed
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if the test failed.
